Entries.default:
This wooden lift grants access to the towering cliffs separating the settlement above from the jungle below.

The lift is currently raised to the level of the plateau.
[Take the lift down to the ground.]
[Leave.]
With the help of an elaborate pulley mechanism, this lift can be raised to the level of the plateau.
[Take the lift up.]
[Throw a grappling hook up the lift.]
The hook successfully gains purchase and snags onto the lift, bridging the gap between the raised mechanism and the ground with a dangling rope.
The hook sails short of the lift and falls to the ground. You discreetly reel it back.
[Climb up to the plateau.]
You reach the top and swing onto the plateau, steeling yourself for a worthy battle.

This wooden lift grants access to the towering cliffs separating the settlement above from the jungle below.

The lift is currently raised to the level of the plateau.
A shout of alarm rises among the Wahaki warriors guarding the cliffside. Archers nock back arrows and take aim in your direction.
As you make your way up the rope, the loud twang of bowstrings announces that the archers have let loose a volley of arrows.
You use the rope to your advantage, swinging your body at angles that confuse the eye - narrowly avoiding injury.

An arrow sinks into your side with a meaty thunk. You grit your teeth to repress a scream, and it takes monumental effort to ignore the pain as you work your way up the rope. 

A steady trickle of blood falls to the distant ground below.
You hasten your climb, closing the distance too quickly for the archers to anticipate your movements.
No one on the plateau has noticed your attempt, though you suspect they would not take to this behavior favorably.
The creaking of wood and straining of rope accompany the lift's upward journey.
The lift strains against the ropes binding it, but the pulley bears you slowly to the ground.
[Take the lift down to the ground.]
